text:
Woh Apna Sa is an Indian Hindi-Language television soap opera.
Which premiered on 23 January 2017.
And is broadcast on Zee TV. The show will be produced by Rashmi Sharma Telefilms Limited.
It Stars Disha Panwar,Sudeep Sahir and Manasi Salvi.
The show follows the story of Jhanvi and Arjun True Love.Ridhi Dogra aho initially played the antagonist role of Nisha quit the show and wswas later replaced by Manasi Salvi. It previously aired Mon-Fri 10PM, but now airs Mon-Fri 7PM as Ishq Subhan Allah was given the 10PM timeslot
